mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.password AS "password", a.nick AS "nick", a.gender AS "gender", a.mail AS "mail", a.birth AS "birth", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.address AS "address", a.type AS "type", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( id, name, password, nick, gender, mail, birth, mobile, address, type, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{nick}, #{gender}, #{mail}, #{birth}, #{mobile}, #{address}, #{type}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, nick = #{nick}, gender = #{gender}, mail = #{mail}, birth = #{birth}, mobile = #{mobile}, address = #{address}, type = #{type}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
